stimulusHtml: Which of the following code segments assigns the same value to result as the preceding code segment for all values of str?

features.html:
In the following code segment, str is a properly declared and initialized  String  variable.

 

int result = 0; 
if (str.length() > 5) 
{
   if (str.indexOf("A") < 0) 
   { 
      result = 1; 
   }
   else if (str.indexOf("B") < 0) 
   {
      result = 2; 
   }
}
else if (str.indexOf("A") < 0) 
{
   result = 3; 
}

choicesHtml:
